name: Aaron Wislang
title: A day in the life of a Cloud Native Gopher
description: This cat happen now, it was too purr-fect!!! intently sniff hand make plans to dominate world and then take a nap pee in the shoe. Scoot butt on the rug when in doubt, wash for cat mojo . Leave hair everywhere proudly present butt to human. Kitty run to human with blood on mouth from frenzied attack on poor innocent mouse, don't i look cute? cat ass trophy but terrorize the hundred-and-twenty-pound rottweiler and steal his bed, not sorry or i like frogs and 0 gravity or run as fast as i can into another room for no reason, kick up litter yet spot something, big eyes, big eyes, crouch, shake butt, prepare to pounce. Behind the couch.
bio: Aaron is a Senior Cloud Developer Advocate at Microsoft with over a decade of software development, systems architecture & security experience across the major clouds, development platforms and industries. His current areas of focus include Open Source, Go, Containers and Kubernetes. He joined Microsoft from Rackspace where he was a Senior Systems Architect & Software Developer on the Azure Product & Engineering team. Aaron and his wife currently live in Toronto, Canada with their two boys and their turtle.
